msbt.message: Furniture's funny, . You can change a room up just by movin' all the stuff around in it. Seein' how you set yours up says a lot about how your mind works.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your bed looks nice and comfy.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Even an ol' toss-and-turner like me could probably fall asleep in it.
Watch much TV, ?I figured I'd just watch the news because I got tired of nonsense and wanted somethin' more serious But these days, the news is just a bunch of goofy nonsense too.

<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa, you like music? I like it too! <20_3 arg="6" />Last thing I do most days is listen to some music to try and relax When you got a temperament like mine, lotsa stuff riles you up. So let's listen to tunes and unwind.

<20_2 arg="10" />Look at that, <20_2 arg="9" />How'd it get to be already? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />"Time flies when you're having fun."'Course these days, time flies no matter what I'm doin'. It's scary!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you got a green thumb<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Your is lookin' real nice, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, your tub's not bad at all. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Gotta have a nice, deep one for soakin' all your troubles away.
<20_2 arg="10" />I could use somethin' like <20_2 arg="9" />your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Classy lookin', perfect height, and lotsa room to put my feet up on it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice . Your favorite? You need a favorite.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Everyone needs a place where they can sit a spell and feel comfy.
<20_2 arg="10" />Why do you have ?<20_3 arg="6" />Wait, can you play? Kinda seein' you in a new light now,
Can't help noticin' you got yourself <20_2 arg="10" />a fancy .<20_3 arg="6" />So does that mean you can cook?'Cause I wouldn't say no to a nice home-cooked meal,
Do you know your way around <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Exercisin' is a fine idea, but I'd hate to see you go and hurt yourself.
<20_2 arg="10" />Well, look at you and your !<20_3 arg="6" />Reckon someone loves the great outdoors as much as yours truly. Nothin' like fresh air, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, look at that. You got your own !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know much about nothin', but a wise once told me that good lightin' is important. And the simple fact that I can see and walk around without bumpin' into stuff means yer lightin' is good!
<20_2 arg="10" />Ah, I shoulda known you'd have .'Cause you're of fine taste and sophistication, kiddo.<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" />Wait. You're not at all!

<20_2 arg="10" />Mind if I ask a personal question?<10_4 /> Whaddaya keep in your , kiddo?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Gah! Forget I asked. It ain't like I need to know. I'm just a nosy , that's all, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Where'd you find such an impressive , kiddo?<20_3 arg="6" />Don't ya love 'em?<20_3 arg="3" /> They're quiet, and they keep to themselves. What else could you want out of a roommate?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That there's one happy-lookin' , kiddo.<20_3 arg="3" />OrI think it is. They can be a mite hard to read.<10_4 /><20_3 arg="6" /> What am I sayin'? It lives with you. Of course it's happy!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" />You're braver than I am, kiddo.<20_3 arg="3" /> I couldn't deal with havin' a fossil in my house, .Last thing I need is an ancient fossil ghost asking me to make 'em some at 2 in the morning.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow! Where'd you get your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'll be the first to admit I don't know art from , but I like it, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I knew you had taste, but I didn't know you had "decorate with " taste!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You're just full of surprises, kiddo. That's why I like ya, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Fancyin' up your place with , I see.<20_3 arg="3" />I'm sure I've mentioned I ain't no art expert, but I know enough to tell you that this here<20_3 arg="6" />is definitely an art.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now, don't fret. I'm only gonna look at your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I know how it is. There are few things more precious to someone than their temperature settings, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That there is one strong-lookin' you got.<20_3 arg="3" />There's just a raw, rugged air to it, like it could take on anything. <20_3 arg="6" />Exactly like yours truly, !
